Package ace.platform

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinaryClassLoader
    Useful and extensible custom class loader which simplifies loading classes and resources from their binary images.
    Classes
    Utility class for working with classes.
    Exceptions
    Utility class for working with exceptions.
    Jar
    Useful class for working with a jar file.
    Jars
    Utility class for working with jar files.
    JRE
    Utility class for working with the JRE.
    JVM
    Utility class for working with the JVM.
    OS
    Utility class for working with the operative system.
    Packages
    Utility class for working with packages.
    Reflection
    Utility class for working with reflection.
    ReflectionPropertyHelper<T>
    Useful property helper class allowing access to a getter/setter pair in a silent way (handling exceptions).
    User
    Utility class for working with the current user information.
